name: Pyrrhic Podthrower
movement: walking speed of 20 feet and burrowing at the same speed
description: The Pyrrhic Podthrower is a small plant creature that resembles a clump of crabgrass when motionless, allowing it to effectively ambush unsuspecting foes.
memorable: It regenerates health each turn unless damaged by necrotic attacks, making it a persistent threat.
goals: To ambush and attack, using regenerative abilities to endure attacks and inflict damage with explosive seedpods.
relations: Can be encountered in environments densely populated with plants or similar creatures.
environment: Typically found in grassy areas or regions where it can blend in with plant life.
strengths: Possesses significant regenerative powers and can inflict area fire damage with explosive attacks.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to necrotic damage, which prevents its regeneration.
attacks: Utilizes multiattacks with Grass Blades for slashing damage or Flaming Seedpods for explosive fire damage.
most_powerful_ability: Regeneration allows it to restore 10 hit points at the start of its turn, maintaining its presence in combat.
senses: Has tremorsense up to 90 feet, allowing it to detect movement in its vicinity.
skills: Has average awareness reflected in a passive perception score of 10.
additional_information: False Appearance ability helps in ambushing.
Can regrow explosive seedpods each turn.
Deals fire damage with its Flaming Seedpod attacks.
Can explode when grappled, causing damage to nearby creatures.
test_queries: creature that blends in with grass
plant that can burrow and attack
